com.controller.entities

Class EnemyController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.controller.entities.EntityController
      • com.controller.entities.EnemyController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Behavior
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BasicWalker, FlyingEnemy, ToughEnemy

    public class EnemyController
extends EntityController
implements Behavior
    Creates a default Enemy, to be fully implemented by the methods of the specific enemy types.
